ygData.subject: Re: where do I hunt at 5th lvl?
ygData.msgSnippet: ive been in feydwer for about a week. (im a de necro)  its quite nice, the orcs dont attack me at all.  ive even wandered thru crushbone and not been attacked
ygData.messageBody:
ive been in feydwer for about a week. (im a de necro) its quite nice, the
orcs dont attack me at all. ive even wandered thru crushbone and not been
attacked by anything. me and my friend were scaring people into thinking
that i was Dvinn! that was really funny.

my solution, dont kill orcs. ive been killing some faeries, and that seems
to boost your rep with the orcs. killing orcs (crushbone orcs, that is)
lowers your faction with several groups, but most importantly (for me) is
the Indigo Brotherhood, which is, i believe, the neriak warrior guild, and
hence the guards.

anyone hunt in lesser feydark? i cant seem to find any strong wasps to
fight...

belphenor

>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>The only problem with going to crushbone as a necro, is the orcs there are
>allied with Nerriak...hence causing you a big problem later on down the
>road.
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 10:34 AM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] where do I hunt at 5th lvl?
>
>
>So yah think if I went into GF and went to Crushbone I would do ok?
>;-) as long as I can dodge the guards.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Jaded
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 9:49 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] where do I hunt at 5th lvl?
>
>
> I had a gnome magician once. When I got to 5 I left Steamfont. You CAN
>still find rogue clockworks outside the newbie area, but you have to
>constantly dodge young ebony drakes and things.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 9:39 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] where do I hunt at 5th lvl?
>
>
> I made 5th lvl last night and my little gnome necro is doing fine, but
>I
>can see now I am starting to get too powerful w/ my big Skeleton buddy for
>the kolbolds. They CON Black and when I was 4th I was taking on 2 yellows
>and winning! I love being a necromancer.
>
>
> Anyway where can I go to find L5-9 MOBs in STEAMFONT???
>
> Thanks!
>
>
